\begin{center}
\textbf{KPMP Data Quality Report Card}
\end{center}

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
#Load library
library(Hmisc)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)

load("../report_card_data/prepared_data_locked_july.RData")
load("rctfns.RData")
load("visitsfns.RData")
load("biospecimensfncs.RData")
load("setup_basicfns.RData")
```

```{r}
joslin1 = format_rct_kable(data, site = c("joslin","brigham"), type = "ckd",
                           current_quarter = current_quarter, previous_quarter = previous_quarter,
                           goal = goal_joslin + goal_brigham, goal1=goal_brigham, goal2=goal_ccf, goal3=goal_joslin, goal4=goal_utsw)

kbl(joslin1$kb, linesep="", booktabs=T, align=c("l", rep("c",5)), escape=F,
    col.names=linebreak(c("Joslin and Brigham", "Current\nQuarter\n3/2/2021 -\n6/4/2021", "Previous\nQuarter\n12/1/2020 -\n3/1/2021", "Change", "Cumulative", "All CKD Sites\n(Range)"), align="c")) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("hold_position", "scale_down")) %>%
  column_spec(1, width="7.4cm") %>%
  column_spec(4, image=spec_image(c("images/empty.png", joslin1$change), 30, 30)) %>%
  column_spec(6, width="3cm", latex_valign="m") %>%
  # row_spec(0, color="white", background="#2c5494") %>%
  row_spec(1, italic=T, background="#d9d9d9") %>%
  row_spec(6, background=c("white", joslin1$bgc$bgc_goal, rep("white",3))) %>%
  row_spec(14, background=c("white", joslin1$bgc$bgc_retention, rep("white",3))) %>%
  pack_rows("Participants not Followed prior to Biopsy (N)", 7, 10, bold=F) %>%
  pack_rows("Participants not Followed post Biopsy (N)", 11, 13, bold=F) %>%
  footnote(number="100-(participants not followed post biopsy/total participants biopsied*100).")
```

```{r}
joslin2 = format_crfs_kable(data, site = c("joslin","brigham"), type = "ckd",
                            current_quarter = current_quarter, previous_quarter = previous_quarter)

kbl(joslin2$kb, linesep="", booktabs=T, align=c("l", rep("c",5)), escape=F,
    col.names=linebreak(c("Joslin and Brigham", "Current\nQuarter\n3/2/2021 -\n6/4/2021", "Previous\nQuarter\n12/1/2020 -\n3/1/2021", "Change", "Cumulative", "All CKD Sites\n(Range)"), align="c")) %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = c("hold_position", "scale_down")) %>%
  column_spec(1, width="7.4cm") %>%
  column_spec(4, image=spec_image(c("images/empty.png", joslin2$change), 30, 30)) %>%
  column_spec(6, width="3cm", latex_valign="m") %>%
  # row_spec(0, color="white", background="#2c5494") %>%
  row_spec(1, italic=T, background="#d9d9d9") %>%
  column_spec(2, background=c("#d9d9d9", joslin2$bgc$current)) %>%
  column_spec(3, background=c("#d9d9d9", joslin2$bgc$previous)) %>%
  pack_rows("Participant Completed Surveys", 4, 5, bold=F) %>%
  pack_rows(paste0("CRFs Per Timepoint", footnote_marker_alphabet(5, "latex")), 6, 12, bold=F, escape=F) %>%
  footnote(alphabet=c("Expected: total number past upper limit of allowable window.",
                      "Includes 24 hour, 14 day, 28 day, 6 months, and 12 months follow-up visits.",
                      "Includes all consented participants and CRFs from enrollment to 12 months.",
                      "6 month experience survey was implemented approximately 1 year after the start of recruitment, therefore some participants did not have the opportunity to complete this CRF.",
                      "Per timepoint, different number of CRFs are included."),
           threeparttable=T)
```
